snippet: Facebook's S-1 filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission is the first step toward an initial public offering. DealBook is annotating the 148-page prospectus to decipher the giant social network's revenue, profit and risk factors.
abstract: Facebook's S-1 filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission is the first step toward an initial public offering. DealBook is annotating the 148-page prospectus to decipher the giant social network's revenue, profit and risk factors.
